title: Commission Regulation (EEC) No 2570/90 of 5 September 1990 amending Regulation (EEC) No 1727/70 on intervention procedure for raw tobacco
header:
COMMISSION  REGULATION (EEC) No 2570/90
of 5 September 1990
amending Regulation (EEC) No 1727/70 on intervention procedure for raw tobacco
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
The following paragraph is hereby added to Article 6 of Regulation (EEC) No 1727/70:
'3. If the weight of the tobacco not meeting the minimum characteristics and the foreign matter contained exceed 10 % taken together, the whole batch must be rejected.'

This Regulation shall enter into force on the third day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 5 September 1990.
For the Commission
Ray MAC SHARRY
Member of the Commission
